com.oneops.certs

Class CwsClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oneops.certs.CwsClient

  • public abstract class CwsClient
extends Object
    Certificate Web Service client, used to create, renew, and download X509 certificates. Authentication to Certificate Web Services is performed via certificate based mutual TLS.
    Author:
    Suresh

    • Method Detail

      • endPoint

        public abstract String endPoint()
        CWS end point name.

      • appId

        public abstract String appId()
        Application id requesting certificate management system to perform certificate operations.

      • teamDL

        public abstract String teamDL()
        Team email distribution list set up in the certificate management system, which owns the certificate. CWS uses a hierarchical structure like "Org\\Team\\Project\\....".

      • domain

        @Nullable
public abstract String domain()
        Domain name for requesting certificate in format like “your-company.com”. Domain field is required when requesting internet facing (external) certificate. It is optional field if requesting internal certificate.

      • keystore

        public abstract String keystore()
        PKCS#12 (.p12) keystore file path used for authentication to Certificate Web Services, which is performed via certificate based mutual TLS. If the path starts with classpath:, it will be loaded from classpath.

      • storePassword

        public abstract String storePassword()
        Keystore password.

      • debug

        public abstract boolean debug()
        Enable http logging for debugging.

      • timeout

        public abstract int timeout()
        Connection/read/write timeout.

      • builder

        public static CwsClient.Builder builder()

      • createCert

        public CreateRes createCert(CreateReq req)
                     throws IOException
        Create requests certificate from Certificate Management system. This call supports explicitly providing the certificate fields and letting certificate management system centrally create the key pair and CSR. If the certificate being requested already exists, the call will fail. Caller application or app id must have ‘create’ rights to the policy where the certificate will be created.
        Parameters:
        req - CreateReq
        Returns:
        CreateRes
        Throws:
        IOException - throws if certificate already exists or PolicyDN doesn't exist or any communication error to the service.

      • createCert

        public String createCert(String commonName,
                         List<String> subjectAltNames,
                         String teamDLName)
                  throws IOException
        Creates a new certificate for the given common name and SANs under given email.
        Parameters:
        commonName - cert common name
        subjectAltNames - Subject Alternative Name (SAN). This can be email, IP address, DNS name, URI etc.
        teamDLName - The team DL, which can be absolute/relative to the base teamDL().
        Returns:
        certificate DN of the generated cert.
        Throws:
        IOException - throws if certificate already exists or PolicyDN doesn't exist or any * communication error to the service.

      • createPolicyDN

        public boolean createPolicyDN(String teamDLName)
                       throws IOException
        Creates a new policy for the specified teamDL if not exists.
        Parameters:
        teamDLName - The team DL, which can be absolute/relative to the base teamDL().
        Returns:
        true if policy is created or already exists.
        Throws:
        IOException - throws if can't create the PolicyDN or any communication error to the service.

      • renewCert

        public CwsResponse renewCert(RenewReq req)
                      throws IOException
        Renew an existing certificate. This call marks a certificate for immediate renewal. The certificate must not be in error or processing state in order for it to be renewable.
        Parameters:
        req - RenewReq
        Returns:
        CwsResponse
        Throws:
        IOException - throws if certificate/PolicyDN doesn't exist or any communication error to the service.

      • renewCert

        public boolean renewCert(String commonName,
                         String teamDLName)
                  throws IOException
        Renew an existing certificate with the given common name.
        Parameters:
        commonName - cert common name
        teamDLName - The team DL, which can be absolute/relative to the base teamDL().
        Returns:
        true if the cert renew is successful.
        Throws:
        IOException - throws if certificate/PolicyDN doesn't exist or any communication error to the service.

      • obsoleteCert

        public CwsResponse obsoleteCert(CwsRequest req)
                         throws IOException
        Obsoletes an existing certificate.
        Parameters:
        req - CwsRequest
        Returns:
        CwsResponse
        Throws:
        IOException - throws if certificate/PolicyDN doesn't exist or any communication error to the service.

      • obsoleteCert

        public boolean obsoleteCert(String commonName,
                            String teamDLName)
                     throws IOException
        Obsoletes an existing certificate with the given common name.
        Parameters:
        commonName - cert common name
        teamDLName - The team DL, which can be absolute/relative to the base teamDL().
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful.
        Throws:
        IOException - throws if certificate/PolicyDN doesn't exist or any communication error to the service.

      • downloadCert

        public DownloadRes downloadCert(DownloadReq req)
                         throws IOException
        Returns the certificate data for certificate in the format requested in base64 encoded format.
        Parameters:
        req - DownloadReq
        Returns:
        DownloadRes
        Throws:
        IOException - throws if certificate/PolicyDN doesn't exist or any communication error to the service.

      • downloadCert

        public String downloadCert(String commonName,
                           String teamDLName,
                           String password,
                           CertFormat format)
                    throws IOException
        Returns the certificate data with given details in the format requested in base64 encoded format.
        Parameters:
        commonName - cert common name
        teamDLName - The team DL, which can be absolute/relative to the base teamDL().
        password - The password to protect the private key. Password complexity requires between 12 and 100 characters and at least one of each the following: 
                * Uppercase character
        * Lowercase character
        * Special character
        * Number
        format - CertFormat The format in which the certificate should be returned.
        Returns:
        Certificate data in the format requested in base64 encoded format.
        Throws:
        IOException - throws if certificate/PolicyDN doesn't exist or any communication error to the service.

      • certExpiring

        public ExpiringRes certExpiring(ExpiringReq req)
                         throws IOException
        Returns whether a certificate will expire within a given number of days.
        Parameters:
        req - ExpiringReq
        Returns:
        ExpiringRes
        Throws:
        IOException - throws if certificate/PolicyDN doesn't exist or any communication error to the service.

      • certExpiring

        public boolean certExpiring(String commonName,
                            String teamDLName,
                            int days)
                     throws IOException
        Returns whether a certificate will expire within a given number of days.
        Parameters:
        commonName - cert common name
        teamDLName - The team DL, which can be absolute/relative to the base teamDL().
        days - Number used to check if a certificate will expire within that number of days.
        Returns:
        true if cert expires within the given number of days.
        Throws:
        IOException - throws if certificate/PolicyDN doesn't exist or any communication error to the service.

      • certExists

        public boolean certExists(String commonName,
                          String teamDLName)
                   throws IOException
        Checks whether the certificate with given common name exists.
        Parameters:
        commonName - cert common name
        teamDLName - The team DL, which can be absolute/relative to the base teamDL().
        Returns:
        true if cert exists, else return false.
        Throws:
        IOException - throws if PolicyDN doesn't exist or any communication error to the service.

      • revokeCert

        public RevokeRes revokeCert(RevokeReq req)
                     throws IOException
        Revoke and disables certificate under a certain team DL.
        Parameters:
        req - RevokeReq
        Returns:
        RevokeRes
        Throws:
        IOException - throws if certificate/PolicyDN doesn't exist or any communication error to the service.

      • revokeCert

        public RevokeRes revokeCert(String commonName,
                            String teamDLName,
                            RevokeReason reason,
                            boolean disable)
                     throws IOException
        Revokes certificate under a certain team DL.
        Parameters:
        commonName - cert common name
        teamDLName - The team DL, which can be absolute/relative to the base teamDL().
        reason - Reason for the revoke.
        disable - Also disable the certificate.
        Returns:
        ViewRes
        Throws:
        IOException - throws if PolicyDN doesn't exist or any communication error to the service.
